traits.Reactive: The giant can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

actions.Multiattack: The giant makes four longsword attacks or two rock attacks.
actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +13+1d10 + 8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) slashing damage.
actions.Rock: Ranged Weapon Attack: +13+1d10 + 8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21+1d10 + 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
